Title: Relates to fees for the use and occupancy of the state right of way by fiber optic utilities; and directing the department of transportation to study the cost of administering state highway rights of way projects
Summary: Adjust the limits on fees for the use and occupancy of the state right of way by fiber optic utilities; directs the department of transportation to study the cost of administering utility projects in state highway rights of way.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Hway L; amd ยง7, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law and the transportation corporations law, in relation to fees for the use and occupancy of the state right of way by fiber optic utilities; directing the department of transportation to study the cost of administering utility projects in state highway rights of way; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
